```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
trips_rain <- read_csv("~/R-stuff/Project_stuff/trips_rain.csv")
```

```{r}
trips_rain <- trips_rain %>% 
  filter(RouteID != 3113184)
trips_rain %>%
  group_by(daily_total) %>%
  summarise(total_dist = sum(Distance_Miles, na.rm = T)/n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = daily_total, y = total_dist)) +
  geom_point() + 
  ylim(0,3) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

trips_rain %>%
  group_by(daily_total) %>%
  summarise(trip_avg = n()/n_distinct(StartDate)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = daily_total, y = trip_avg)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```

```{r}
temp <- trips_rain %>%
  group_by(daily_total) %>%
  summarise(trip_avg = n()/n_distinct(StartDate))
  m1 <- lm(trip_avg ~ daily_total, data = temp)
  summary(m1)
```
